verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: north carolina] [ARG1: lawmakers] [V: return] [ARGM-PRP: for second step on florence aid] north carolina lawmakers are going back to work to decide on approving hundreds of millions of dollars to clean up from hurricane florence and help the storm victims general assembly florence south carolina n c gov roy cooper raleigh north carolina hurricane florence north carolina hurricane michael the associated press raleigh roy cooper florence gop
